name: NFTs2Me
description: NFTs2Me is a user-friendly comprehensive platform to create, deploy and manage your NFT collection on Ronin, 100% free with advanced functionalities.

websites.description: NFTs2Me is a user-friendly comprehensive platform to create, deploy and manage your NFT collection on Ronin, 100% free with advanced functionalities.
NFTs2Me application dashboard where users can create, deploy and manage their NFT collections with advanced tools.

contracts.label: NFTs2Me Factory
contracts.description: Each transaction here represents the creation of a new NFT collection on Ronin.

contracts.label: NFTs2Me Mint Master
contracts.description: Each transaction here represents a mint within an NFT collection on Ronin (inside NFTs2Me).
